description: "Pluto, released in 2023, is an anime adaptation of Naoki Urasawa's work that reimagines the classic anime Astro Boy with a more adult and serious plot. It showcases a world where AI and humans coexist socially, exploring the consequences of this dynamic. The story revolves around Gesicht, a robot Europol investigator tasked with solving a series of murders in a society where AI is programmed not to harm humans. The narrative unfolds with the underlying theme of the strict directive that "Robots must not become any more human…""
